typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	inputFileName as string,
	outputFileName as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceRaw
sourceRaw derive(Engagement_Description = sha2(256, Engagement_Description)) ~> MaskingEngagementDescription
MaskingEngagementDescription sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		{Currency Type},
		Engagement,
		Engagement_Description,
		Engagement_Manager,
		Engagement_Manager_Name,
		Engagement_Partner,
		Engagement_Partner_Name,
		Engagement_Profit_Center,
		Engagement_Responsible_Person_Job_Level_Global,
		Fiscal_Year_Period,
		Office,
		Current_Inputs_Rolling12mths_Ltcp,
		Eng_Age_Kpi,
		Inputs_Over365days_LTP,
		Lockup_Days_Without_Tax_Ltcp,
		Net_Investment_With_Tax_Ltcp,
		Unbilled_WIP_Ltcp,
		ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
